short_description: This function runs cross validation of glm for analytics functions.
long_description: This function runs cross validation of glm for analytics functions to evaluate models.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: CVTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the output table that contains the cross-validation errors for all models. Default is ‘cvtable’.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the output table that contains the cross-validation errors for all models. Default is ‘cvtable’.

argument_clauses.name: Function
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the function to be cross-validated. Only ta.glm (‘glm’) is supported.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the function to be cross-validated. Only GLM (‘glm’) is supported.

argument_clauses.name: CVParams
argument_clauses.rDescription: The list of the arguments that will be used in cross validation
argument_clauses.description: The list of the arguments that will be used in cross validation

argument_clauses.name: FoldNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: The value of k in k-fold cross validation. Default is 10.
argument_clauses.description: The value of k in k-fold cross validation. Default is 10.

argument_clauses.name: Metric
argument_clauses.rDescription: Error function used to calculate the cross-validation error. Possible values are ‘AUROC’ (area under the ROC curve) and ‘MSE’ (mean squared error). Default is 'AUROC'.
argument_clauses.description: Error function used to calculate the cross-validation error. Possible values are ‘AUROC’ (area under the ROC curve) and ‘MSE’ (mean squared error). Default is 'AUROC'.

argument_clauses.name: InputTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input data.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the table containing the input data.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the columns of the input table that contain the response and predictors like Y,X1,X2,...,Xp.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the columns of the input table that contain the response and predictors like Y,X1,X2,...,Xp.

argument_clauses.name: CategoricalColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies columnname-value pairs, 'columnname:max_cardinality' or 'columnname:(category [, ...])' or 'columnname'
argument_clauses.description: Specifies columnname-value pairs, 'columnname:max_cardinality' or 'columnname:(category [, ...])' or 'columnname'

argument_clauses.name: OutputTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the output table.

argument_clauses.name: Step
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether the function runs stepwise glm.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether the function runs stepwise glm.

argument_clauses.name: Family
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the distribution exponential family.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the distribution exponential family.

argument_clauses.name: Link
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the canonical link functions.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the canonical link functions.

argument_clauses.name: Weight
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of an input table column that contains the weights to assign to responses.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of an input table column that contains the weights to assign to responses.

argument_clauses.name: Threshold
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the convergence threshold.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the convergence threshold.

argument_clauses.name: MaxIterNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the maximum number of steps the function executes before quitting if the convergence threshold has not been met.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the maximum number of steps the function executes before quitting if the convergence threshold has not been met.

argument_clauses.name: Intercept
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies whether an intercept is included in the model.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies whether an intercept is included in the model.
